short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights images and saves them on click to your bursts profile

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With bursts.us, when you find an image you like online, simply use the extension to save the image to your profile.  Back in your bursts dashboard, you'll see an archive of the things you've saved, with an easy link back to where you saved it.
